source_caption_data.pre_caption: The video starts with a high-angle full shot, showing a woman in the center of the frame standing on a hoverboard on a building ledge in the middle ground. As she moves forward and drops onto a lower walkway, the camera pulls back and tilts further downward, transitioning into a top-down wide shot. In this final framing, the woman travels forward along the transparent walkway, which extends diagonally across the scene, while the camera tracks backward, keeping her centered in the frame.
